archimate:Goal.name: Vulnerability Management bound to processes defined in S&C Vulnerability Management project
archimate:Goal.documentation:
Security & Compliance is running a Vulnerability Management Project.
On the 2nd phase of Vulnerability Managmeent Project, it will establish a risk-based remediation strategy and processes which is connected to our standard ITIL processes. Project will define mitigation processes which will be used in case of vulnerability cannot be fixed and in case of high critical vulnerability. Finally, project will also deliver risk acceptance and monitoring framework which is connected to our standard business risk services. Project will also enable the capability of automatically monitor the status of vulnerability through either remediation, mitigation or risk acceptance process.
Once the Norwegian assets + services are identified, those needs to be bound to the processes which S&C Vulnerability Management project will deliver.
